Title: On Bloodborne’s 10th Birthday, and With Neither a Sequel nor a Next-Gen Update in Sight, Fans Once Again Organize a Return to Yharnam
Description:
PS4 masterpiece Bloodborne turns 10 years old today, and fans are celebrating by organizing yet another return to Yharnam community event.
But what they really want is either a next-gen update, a remaster, or a sequel.
Unfortunately neither seems likely.
